title: Extended Timeline v0.10.0 - Europa Universalis IV mod
description:
Extended Timeline v0.10.0 - Europa Universalis IV mod

Extract 7zip file to your C:Users[user]Documents Paradox Interactive Europa Universalis IV mod folder


Update: Aug 16 @ 9:31am
Version 0.10.0
Old saves should be fully compatible.

Added features:
- Overhauled building system:
- 18 new buildings
- Buildings are now better distributed along the timeline
- Two first buildings of each category won't be destroyed when the province is conquered
- New religion: Egyptian
- New culture: Kurdish
- 29 new unit types mostly for Roman and Barbarian tech groups
- Descriptions for all units that didn't have one
- Country forming decisions for Israel and Inca
- Country appearing events for South-East Asia
- National Ideas for Suriname, Aztecs, Haripunchai, Blackfoot, Comanche, Mexico, CSA, Bahamas, Chimu and St. Vincent and the Grenadines

Bugfixes:
- Fixed French vassals at 1444 start
- History fixes for barbarian tribes and Bulgaria
- Other minor fixes

Up to date for EUIV version 1.7 and all DLC. 

The Extended Timeline starts in the year 51 and continues all the way to the present day. You can play with the ancient Roman Empire, any modern world nation or anything in between. 

Main features: 
- Playable timeline extended to 51-9999. 
- Over 500 countries, each with historical territories and rulers at any given date. 
- Added over 100 new provinces removing all wastelands. 
- 23 new religions. 
- New cultures, technologies and units. 
- Bunch of new events and decisions.
